input.sentences: the old flyers had been kept to remember fun times past .
a special concert had been a once-in-a-lifetime experience .
some think mementos just take up space .
even as generations come and go | the special trinkets and memories of those past can be a treat to relive .
output.sentences: I found some flyers form old times my Mom said she can still remember from the past.
She said that what I found was memories of some special times in her lifetime where she had a good experience.
One thing I found unique in the pile was a hand drawn depiction of Tom and Jerry advertising a carnival.
I was going to need to find a space to hold these special mementos until Mother's Day.
I had decided to wrap them up withe the treats that I had already got her for that special day.
